title: 김문주박사 세미나 개최 안내 (7월10일(월) 오후4시， 교수회의실)
content:
* 이벤트에 공지가 되지를 않아 이곳에 올립니다. (죄송~~~)

세미나 제목  :   High Reliability of SW by Practical Application of        
                      Formal  Methods
 
세미나 시간 :     7월 10일(월) 16:00 -17:00

세미나 장소 :  교수회의실

세미나 연사 :  김문주 박사


Abstract:
This presentation consists of three parts. The first part shows personal
research background.
The second part, which is a main theme of the presentation, proposes a
Monitoring and Checking (MaC) based 
debugger framework for model checkers, called McBugger.
Model checking is an effective means to detect design flaws 
of target systems by analyzing counter examples. A traditional way of 
detecting bugs of a target model is based on “catch one and fix one” 
iternations; once a bug is identified, to detect another bug, we must fix 
the bug and verifiy the model again until no more bugs are found. In 
reality, however, to fix a bug is a much more complex task than to detect 
a bug and even infeasible in many situations. 
McBugger identifies multiple bugs without 
modifying/fixing a target model by analyzing counter examples. We 
demonstrate the effectiveness of the McBugger framework through a case 
study of high-availability protocol used by network security appliances. 
The third part concludes the presentation with future works.
